original: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ parijānittha so samudayasaccaṁ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ dukkha saccam parijānittha saḥ samudaya saccam pajahittha ati āmantā

original: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānittha so samudayasaccaṁ nappajahitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ dukkha saccam na parijānittha saḥ samudaya saccam na ppajahittha ati āmantā
